import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../sections/Navbar"; import Footer from "../sections/Footer"; import { useStateContext } from "../context/StateContext"; import { useProductsContext } from "../context/ProductsContext"; function SingleProduct() { const { id } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const { onFavorite, unFavorite } = useProductsContext(); const { addToCart, setShowCart } = useStateContext(); useEffect(() => { // Fetch data for the specific product using the id const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/products/${id}`); const productData = await response.json(); setProduct(productData); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching product data:", error); } }; fetchData(); }, [id]); if (!product) { return
Loading...
; } const { sale, category, img_url, price, description, product_id, product_name, } = product; // Render your SingleProduct component with the fetched data return ( <> {/* */}
{category}

{product_name}

{sale > 0 ? ( {price} {" "} {price - price / sale} $ ) : ( `${price} $` )}
